product_name: Maui Jim Makaha Polarized Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: Makaha polarized sunglasses protect your eyes from the harmful rays and glare of the sun with Maui Jim PolarizedPlus(R)2 technology. PolarizedPlus2 blocks glare and UV light from all angles while managing harmful blue light and boosting colors for clarity and contrast. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Neutral gray lens tint provides great contrast in all light conditions, especially bright, direct sunlight. Front and back of lenses feature a Clearshell(R) hard coating that provides excellent scratch resistance. Extremely impact-resistant, Grilamid lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility at any temperature. Rimless rectangular frames hug the head and fit many face sizes. Lenses and frames are treated for use in saltwater. Rubber nose pads and temple ends prevent slippage. Anti-corrosive nickel/silver hinge. Maui Jim Makaha sunglasses come with a semirigid case and a soft pouch for cleaning and storage.
